mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NULL ) WHERE EVENT_END < SYSDATE OR EVENT_END IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) AND SYSDATE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -6) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -6) AND SYSDATE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -12) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -12) AND SYSDATE
SELECT PAY_DATE,PAY_PRICE FROM PAYMENT
SELECT PAY_DATE,PAY_PRICE FROM PAYMENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAY_CODE, B_EMAIL, S_EMAIL, S_CODE, PAY_CATE, PAY_CATE1, PAY_TYPE, PAY_COUPON, PAY_PRICE, PAY_ENDDATE, EVENT_START, EVENT_END, PAY_ORIGINP, PAY_COM) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(PAY_CODE)),0) +1 FROM PAYMENT), #{b_email}, #{s_email}, #{s_code}, #{pay_cate}, 'SUB2-3', 'PAY_TPYE', #{pay_coupon}, #{pay_price}, TO_DATE(#{pay_enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{event_start},'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{event_end},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{pay_originp}, #{pay_com})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'01',pay_price,0)),0) AS "january", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'02',pay_price,0)),0) AS "february", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'03',pay_price,0)),0) AS "march", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'04',pay_price,0)),0) AS "april", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'05',pay_price,0)),0) AS "may", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'06',pay_price,0)),0) AS "june", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'07',pay_price,0)),0) AS "july", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'08',pay_price,0)),0) AS "august", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'09',pay_price,0)),0) AS "september", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'10',pay_price,0)),0) AS "october", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'11',pay_price,0)),0) AS "november", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'12',pay_price,0)),0) AS "december" FROM payment WHERE S_EMAIL= #{s_email} AND SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),0,4)= #{year} AND S_CODE = #{scode}

SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'01',pay_com,0)),0) AS "january", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'02',pay_com,0)),0) AS "february", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'03',pay_com,0)),0) AS "march", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'04',pay_com,0)),0) AS "april", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'05',pay_com,0)),0) AS "may", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'06',pay_com,0)),0) AS "june", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'07',pay_com,0)),0) AS "july", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'08',pay_com,0)),0) AS "august", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'09',pay_com,0)),0) AS "september", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'10',pay_com,0)),0) AS "october", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'11',pay_com,0)),0) AS "november", NVL(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),6,2),'12',pay_com,0)),0) AS "december" FROM payment WHERE s_email= #{s_email} and SUBSTR(to_char(pay_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),0,4) = #{year} AND S_CODE = #{scode}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_PRICE),0) totalsum, NVL(SUM(PAY_COM),0) totalsusu FROM PAYMENT WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'),0,4)= #{year} AND S_CODE = #{s_code} and S_EMAIL= #{s_email} AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL

select count(*) from ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NULL ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select count(*) FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NULL ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -6) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC ) A )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM (SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -6) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -12) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -12) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{firstDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{secondDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT P.*, B.B_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.*, S.SER_TITLE FROM PAYMENT P, SERVICE S WHERE P.S_CODE=S.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}) P , BUYER B WHERE P.B_EMAIL = B.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{firstDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{secondDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY P.PAY_DATE DESC)
SELECT * FROM V_CALENDAR WHERE B_EMAIL = #{b_email}
SELECT * FROM V_CALENDAR WHERE S_EMAIL = #{s_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENT SET PAY_ENDDATE = sysdate WHERE (TO_CHAR(EVENT_END+7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EVENT_END IS NOT NULL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NULL) OR (TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE+7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EVENT_END IS NULL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NULL)
mapper.select: select * from v_calendar where b_email = #{b_email} and ser_title = #{ser_title} and pay_code = #{pay_code}
select * from v_calendar where s_email = #{s_email} and b_nickname = #{b_nickname} and pay_code = #{pay_code}
